title: Area between curves intersecting more than twice

content.prompt: What is the area enclosed by the curves y = x3 − 8x2 + 18x − 5 and y = x + 5?

topic.text: 8.6: Finding the Area Between Curves That Intersect at More Than Two Points

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
